page.title: 01Helme Park Nursery.
page.content: We went to Helme Park which is a nursery for young trees and shrubs.The man who showed us around was called Mr. Jones. He told us the names of all the trees and made special notice of some rarer trees.These included a red leaf oak,Japanese poplar and Canadian maple tree.Of the more common types there were oak, sycamore, beech and most other common trees. Helme Park is run by the Northern Forestry Products but the three men who work there at present are going to be made redundant.The company are going to sell the magnificent house and out-buildings as well as the grounds. It means that the trees and shrubs will have to be sold and the men will have to find new jobs which is very difficult these days.
